section.name: Pluto 1.1
section.p: Pluto 1.1 is a re-architecture of the version 1.0.1 portlet container to make it easier to embed Pluto in a Portal. The Pluto Portal Driver has also been refactored in 1.1 to improve ease of use and modification.

subsection.name: Building Pluto 1.1
subsection.p: Building Pluto 1.1 requires the use of Maven 2 on the Pluto 1.1 branch of the Subversion source code repository.

For instructions on how to obtain the source code for the 1.1 branch see the Using Subversion section of the Developer Guide, but use https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/portals/pluto/branches/pluto-1.1 as the URI in the svn commands.
See the README document in the source distribution for instructions on how to build Pluto 1.1, install the portal driver in Tomcat and deploy custom portlets to the portal.
The Pluto 1.1 Subversion source code repository can also be viewed online at http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/portals/pluto/branches/pluto-1.1/

subsection.name: Snapshots
subsection.p:
Periodic snapshots of stable Pluto 1.1 builds can be found at
http://cvs.apache.org/repository/org/apache/pluto/.
